00091 static LARGE_INTEGER liFrequency;
00092 static LARGE_INTEGER liStartTime;
00093 static LARGE_INTEGER liCurrentTime;
00094 
00095 static void tstart ( void )
00096 {
00097     QueryPerformanceFrequency ( &liFrequency );
00098     QueryPerformanceCounter ( &liStartTime );
00099 }
00100 static void tend ( void )
00101 {
00102     QueryPerformanceCounter ( &liCurrentTime );
00103 }
00104 static double tval( void )
00105 {
00106     return ((double)( (liCurrentTime.QuadPart - liStartTime.QuadPart)* (double)1000.0/(double)liFrequency.QuadPart ));
00107 }
00108 #else
00109 #include <sys/time.h>
00110 static struct timeval _tstart, _tend;
00111 static struct timezone tz;
00112 static void tstart ( void )
00113 {
00114     gettimeofday ( &_tstart, &tz );
00115 }
00116 static void tend ( void )
00117 {
00118     gettimeofday ( &_tend,&tz );
00119 }
00120 
00121 #if 0 // unused
00122 static double tval()
00123 {
00124     double t1, t2;
00125     t1 = ( double ) _tstart.tv_sec*1000 + ( double ) _tstart.tv_usec/ ( 1000 );
00126     t2 = ( double ) _tend.tv_sec*1000 + ( double ) _tend.tv_usec/ ( 1000 );
00127     return t2-t1;
00128 }
00129 #endif
00130 #endif

00160 static int smokeModifier_init (SmokeModifierData *smd, Object *ob, Scene *scene, DerivedMesh *dm)
00161 {
00162     if ((smd->type & MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_DOMAIN) && smd->domain && !smd->domain->fluid)
00163     {
00164         size_t i;
00165         float min[3] = {FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX}, max[3] = {-FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX};
00166         float size[3];
00167         MVert *verts = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00168         float scale = 0.0;
00169         int res;        
00170 
00171         res = smd->domain->maxres;
00172 
00173         // get BB of domain
00174         for (i = 0; i < dm->getNumVerts(dm); i++)
00175         {
00176             float tmp[3];
00177 
00178             copy_v3_v3(tmp, verts[i].co);
00179             mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, tmp);
00180 
00181             // min BB
00182             min[0] = MIN2(min[0], tmp[0]);
00183             min[1] = MIN2(min[1], tmp[1]);
00184             min[2] = MIN2(min[2], tmp[2]);
00185 
00186             // max BB
00187             max[0] = MAX2(max[0], tmp[0]);
00188             max[1] = MAX2(max[1], tmp[1]);
00189             max[2] = MAX2(max[2], tmp[2]);
00190         }
00191 
00192         copy_v3_v3(smd->domain->p0, min);
00193         copy_v3_v3(smd->domain->p1, max);
00194 
00195         // calc other res with max_res provided
00196         sub_v3_v3v3(size, max, min);
00197 
00198         // printf("size: %f, %f, %f\n", size[0], size[1], size[2]);
00199 
00200         // prevent crash when initializing a plane as domain
00201         if ((size[0] < FLT_EPSILON) || (size[1] < FLT_EPSILON) || (size[2] < FLT_EPSILON))
00202             return 0;
00203 
00204         if (size[0] > size[1])
00205         {
00206             if (size[0] > size[2])
00207             {
00208                 scale = res / size[0];
00209                 smd->domain->dx = size[0] / res;
00210                 smd->domain->res[0] = res;
00211                 smd->domain->res[1] = (int)(size[1] * scale + 0.5);
00212                 smd->domain->res[2] = (int)(size[2] * scale + 0.5);
00213             }
00214             else {
00215                 scale = res / size[2];
00216                 smd->domain->dx = size[2] / res;
00217                 smd->domain->res[2] = res;
00218                 smd->domain->res[0] = (int)(size[0] * scale + 0.5);
00219                 smd->domain->res[1] = (int)(size[1] * scale + 0.5);
00220             }
00221         }
00222         else {
00223             if (size[1] > size[2])
00224             {
00225                 scale = res / size[1];
00226                 smd->domain->dx = size[1] / res;
00227                 smd->domain->res[1] = res;
00228                 smd->domain->res[0] = (int)(size[0] * scale + 0.5);
00229                 smd->domain->res[2] = (int)(size[2] * scale + 0.5);
00230             }
00231             else {
00232                 scale = res / size[2];
00233                 smd->domain->dx = size[2] / res;
00234                 smd->domain->res[2] = res;
00235                 smd->domain->res[0] = (int)(size[0] * scale + 0.5);
00236                 smd->domain->res[1] = (int)(size[1] * scale + 0.5);
00237             }
00238         }
00239 
00240         // printf("smd->domain->dx: %f\n", smd->domain->dx);
00241 
00242         // TODO: put in failsafe if res<=0 - dg
00243 
00244         // printf("res[0]: %d, res[1]: %d, res[2]: %d\n", smd->domain->res[0], smd->domain->res[1], smd->domain->res[2]);
00245         // dt max is 0.1
00246         smd->domain->fluid = smoke_init(smd->domain->res, smd->domain->p0);
00247         smd->time = scene->r.cfra;
00248 
00249         if (smd->domain->flags & MOD_SMOKE_HIGHRES)
00250         {
00251             smd->domain->wt = smoke_turbulence_init(smd->domain->res, smd->domain->amplify + 1, smd->domain->noise);
00252             smd->domain->res_wt[0] = smd->domain->res[0] * (smd->domain->amplify + 1);
00253             smd->domain->res_wt[1] = smd->domain->res[1] * (smd->domain->amplify + 1);          
00254             smd->domain->res_wt[2] = smd->domain->res[2] * (smd->domain->amplify + 1);          
00255             smd->domain->dx_wt = smd->domain->dx / (smd->domain->amplify + 1);      
00256             // printf("smd->domain->amplify: %d\n",  smd->domain->amplify);
00257             // printf("(smd->domain->flags & MOD_SMOKE_HIGHRES)\n");
00258         }
00259 
00260         if (!smd->domain->shadow)
00261             smd->domain->shadow = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * smd->domain->res[0] * smd->domain->res[1] * smd->domain->res[2], "SmokeDomainShadow");
00262 
00263         smoke_initBlenderRNA(smd->domain->fluid, &(smd->domain->alpha), &(smd->domain->beta), &(smd->domain->time_scale), &(smd->domain->vorticity), &(smd->domain->border_collisions));
00264 
00265         if (smd->domain->wt)    
00266         {
00267             smoke_initWaveletBlenderRNA(smd->domain->wt, &(smd->domain->strength));
00268             // printf("smoke_initWaveletBlenderRNA\n");
00269         }
00270         return 1;
00271     }
00272     else if ((smd->type & MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_FLOW) && smd->flow)
00273     {
00274         // handle flow object here
00275         // XXX TODO
00276 
00277         smd->time = scene->r.cfra;
00278 
00279         if (smd->flow->psys && smd->flow->psys->part && !(smd->flow->flags & MOD_SMOKE_FLOW_INIT))
00280         {
00281             // update particle lifetime to be one frame
00282             smd->flow->psys->part->lifetime = 1; // scene->r.efra + 1;
00283 
00284             // use "unborn" flag as standard setting
00285             smd->flow->psys->part->flag |= PART_UNBORN;
00286 
00287             smd->flow->flags |= MOD_SMOKE_FLOW_INIT;
00288         }
00289 
00290 /*
00291         if (!smd->flow->bvh)
00292         {
00293             // smd->flow->bvh = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BVHTreeFromMesh), "smoke_bvhfromfaces");
00294             // bvhtree_from_mesh_faces(smd->flow->bvh, dm, 0.0, 2, 6);
00295 
00296             // copy obmat
00297             // copy_m4_m4(smd->flow->mat, ob->obmat);
00298             // copy_m4_m4(smd->flow->mat_old, ob->obmat);
00299         }
00300 */
00301 
00302         return 1;
00303     }
00304     else if ((smd->type & MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_COLL))
00305     {
00306         smd->time = scene->r.cfra;
00307 
00308         // todo: delete this when loading colls work -dg
00309         if (!smd->coll)
00310             smokeModifier_createType(smd);
00311 
00312         if (!smd->coll->points)
00313         {
00314             // init collision points
00315             SmokeCollSettings *scs = smd->coll;
00316 
00317             // copy obmat
00318             copy_m4_m4(scs->mat, ob->obmat);
00319             copy_m4_m4(scs->mat_old, ob->obmat);
00320 
00321             DM_ensure_tessface(dm);
00322             fill_scs_points(ob, dm, scs);
00323         }
00324 
00325         if (!smd->coll->bvhtree)
00326         {
00327             smd->coll->bvhtree = NULL; // bvhtree_build_from_smoke ( ob->obmat, dm->getTessFaceArray(dm), dm->getNumTessFaces(dm), dm->getVertArray(dm), dm->getNumVerts(dm), 0.0 );
00328         }
00329         return 1;
00330     }
00331 
00332     return 2;
00333 }
00334 
00335 static void fill_scs_points(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm, SmokeCollSettings *scs)
00336 {
00337     MVert *mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00338     MFace *mface = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00339     int i = 0, divs = 0;
00340     int *tridivs = NULL;
00341     float cell_len = 1.0 / 50.0; // for res = 50
00342     int newdivs = 0;
00343     int quads = 0, facecounter = 0;
00344 
00345     // count quads
00346     for (i = 0; i < dm->getNumTessFaces(dm); i++)
00347     {
00348         if (mface[i].v4)
00349             quads++;
00350     }
00351 
00352     calcTriangleDivs(ob, mvert, dm->getNumVerts(dm), mface,  dm->getNumTessFaces(dm), dm->getNumTessFaces(dm) + quads, &tridivs, cell_len);
00353 
00354     // count triangle divisions
00355     for (i = 0; i < dm->getNumTessFaces(dm) + quads; i++)
00356     {
00357         divs += (tridivs[3 * i] + 1) * (tridivs[3 * i + 1] + 1) * (tridivs[3 * i + 2] + 1);
00358     }
00359 
00360     // printf("divs: %d\n", divs);
00361 
00362     scs->points = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * (dm->getNumVerts(dm) + divs) * 3, "SmokeCollPoints");
00363 
00364     for (i = 0; i < dm->getNumVerts(dm); i++)
00365     {
00366         float tmpvec[3];
00367         copy_v3_v3(tmpvec, mvert[i].co);
00368         mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, tmpvec);
00369         copy_v3_v3(&scs->points[i * 3], tmpvec);
00370     }
00371     
00372     for (i = 0, facecounter = 0; i < dm->getNumTessFaces(dm); i++)
00373     {
00374         int again = 0;
00375         do
00376         {
00377             int j, k;
00378             int divs1 = tridivs[3 * facecounter + 0];
00379             int divs2 = tridivs[3 * facecounter + 1];
00380             //int divs3 = tridivs[3 * facecounter + 2];
00381             float side1[3], side2[3], trinormorg[3], trinorm[3];
00382             
00383             if (again == 1 && mface[i].v4)
00384             {
00385                 sub_v3_v3v3(side1,  mvert[ mface[i].v3 ].co, mvert[ mface[i].v1 ].co);
00386                 sub_v3_v3v3(side2,  mvert[ mface[i].v4 ].co, mvert[ mface[i].v1 ].co);
00387             }
00388             else {
00389                 sub_v3_v3v3(side1,  mvert[ mface[i].v2 ].co, mvert[ mface[i].v1 ].co);
00390                 sub_v3_v3v3(side2,  mvert[ mface[i].v3 ].co, mvert[ mface[i].v1 ].co);
00391             }
00392 
00393             cross_v3_v3v3(trinormorg, side1, side2);
00394             normalize_v3(trinormorg);
00395             copy_v3_v3(trinorm, trinormorg);
00396             mul_v3_fl(trinorm, 0.25 * cell_len);
00397 
00398             for (j = 0; j <= divs1; j++)
00399             {
00400                 for (k = 0; k <= divs2; k++)
00401                 {
00402                     float p1[3], p2[3], p3[3], p[3]={0,0,0}; 
00403                     const float uf = (float)(j + TRI_UVOFFSET) / (float)(divs1 + 0.0);
00404                     const float vf = (float)(k + TRI_UVOFFSET) / (float)(divs2 + 0.0);
00405                     float tmpvec[3];
00406                     
00407                     if (uf+vf > 1.0) 
00408                     {
00409                         // printf("bigger - divs1: %d, divs2: %d\n", divs1, divs2);
00410                         continue;
00411                     }
00412 
00413                     copy_v3_v3(p1, mvert[ mface[i].v1 ].co);
00414                     if (again == 1 && mface[i].v4)
00415                     {
00416                         copy_v3_v3(p2, mvert[ mface[i].v3 ].co);
00417                         copy_v3_v3(p3, mvert[ mface[i].v4 ].co);
00418                     }
00419                     else {
00420                         copy_v3_v3(p2, mvert[ mface[i].v2 ].co);
00421                         copy_v3_v3(p3, mvert[ mface[i].v3 ].co);
00422                     }
00423 
00424                     mul_v3_fl(p1, (1.0-uf-vf));
00425                     mul_v3_fl(p2, uf);
00426                     mul_v3_fl(p3, vf);
00427                     
00428                     add_v3_v3v3(p, p1, p2);
00429                     add_v3_v3(p, p3);
00430 
00431                     if (newdivs > divs)
00432                         printf("mem problem\n");
00433 
00434                     // mMovPoints.push_back(p + trinorm);
00435                     add_v3_v3v3(tmpvec, p, trinorm);
00436                     mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, tmpvec);
00437                     copy_v3_v3(&scs->points[3 * (dm->getNumVerts(dm) + newdivs)], tmpvec);
00438                     newdivs++;
00439 
00440                     if (newdivs > divs)
00441                         printf("mem problem\n");
00442 
00443                     // mMovPoints.push_back(p - trinorm);
00444                     copy_v3_v3(tmpvec, p);
00445                     sub_v3_v3(tmpvec, trinorm);
00446                     mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, tmpvec);
00447                     copy_v3_v3(&scs->points[3 * (dm->getNumVerts(dm) + newdivs)], tmpvec);
00448                     newdivs++;
00449                 }
00450             }
00451 
00452             if (again == 0 && mface[i].v4)
00453                 again++;
00454             else
00455                 again = 0;
00456 
00457             facecounter++;
00458 
00459         } while (again!=0);
00460     }
00461 
00462     scs->numpoints = dm->getNumVerts(dm) + newdivs;
00463 
00464     MEM_freeN(tridivs);
00465 }
00466 
00468 static void calcTriangleDivs(Object *ob, MVert *verts, int UNUSED(numverts), MFace *faces, int numfaces, int numtris, int **tridivs, float cell_len)
00469 {
00470     // mTriangleDivs1.resize( faces.size() );
00471     // mTriangleDivs2.resize( faces.size() );
00472     // mTriangleDivs3.resize( faces.size() );
00473 
00474     size_t i = 0, facecounter = 0;
00475     float maxscale[3] = {1,1,1}; // = channelFindMaxVf(mcScale);
00476     float maxpart = ABS(maxscale[0]);
00477     float scaleFac = 0;
00478     float fsTri = 0;
00479     if (ABS(maxscale[1])>maxpart) maxpart = ABS(maxscale[1]);
00480     if (ABS(maxscale[2])>maxpart) maxpart = ABS(maxscale[2]);
00481     scaleFac = 1.0 / maxpart;
00482     // featureSize = mLevel[mMaxRefine].nodeSize
00483     fsTri = cell_len * 0.5 * scaleFac;
00484 
00485     if (*tridivs)
00486         MEM_freeN(*tridivs);
00487 
00488     *tridivs = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int) * numtris * 3, "Smoke_Tridivs");
00489 
00490     for (i = 0, facecounter = 0; i < numfaces; i++) 
00491     {
00492         float p0[3], p1[3], p2[3];
00493         float side1[3];
00494         float side2[3];
00495         float side3[3];
00496         int divs1=0, divs2=0, divs3=0;
00497 
00498         copy_v3_v3(p0, verts[faces[i].v1].co);
00499         mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, p0);
00500         copy_v3_v3(p1, verts[faces[i].v2].co);
00501         mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, p1);
00502         copy_v3_v3(p2, verts[faces[i].v3].co);
00503         mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, p2);
00504 
00505         sub_v3_v3v3(side1, p1, p0);
00506         sub_v3_v3v3(side2, p2, p0);
00507         sub_v3_v3v3(side3, p1, p2);
00508 
00509         if (dot_v3v3(side1, side1) > fsTri*fsTri)
00510         { 
00511             float tmp = normalize_v3(side1);
00512             divs1 = (int)ceil(tmp/fsTri); 
00513         }
00514         if (dot_v3v3(side2, side2) > fsTri*fsTri)
00515         { 
00516             float tmp = normalize_v3(side2);
00517             divs2 = (int)ceil(tmp/fsTri); 
00518             
00519             /*
00520             // debug
00521             if (i==0)
00522                 printf("b tmp: %f, fsTri: %f, divs2: %d\n", tmp, fsTri, divs2);
00523             */
00524         }
00525 
00526         (*tridivs)[3 * facecounter + 0] = divs1;
00527         (*tridivs)[3 * facecounter + 1] = divs2;
00528         (*tridivs)[3 * facecounter + 2] = divs3;
00529 
00530         // TODO quad case
00531         if (faces[i].v4)
00532         {
00533             divs1=0, divs2=0, divs3=0;
00534 
00535             facecounter++;
00536             
00537             copy_v3_v3(p0, verts[faces[i].v3].co);
00538             mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, p0);
00539             copy_v3_v3(p1, verts[faces[i].v4].co);
00540             mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, p1);
00541             copy_v3_v3(p2, verts[faces[i].v1].co);
00542             mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, p2);
00543 
00544             sub_v3_v3v3(side1, p1, p0);
00545             sub_v3_v3v3(side2, p2, p0);
00546             sub_v3_v3v3(side3, p1, p2);
00547 
00548             if (dot_v3v3(side1, side1) > fsTri*fsTri)
00549             { 
00550                 float tmp = normalize_v3(side1);
00551                 divs1 = (int)ceil(tmp/fsTri); 
00552             }
00553             if (dot_v3v3(side2, side2) > fsTri*fsTri)
00554             { 
00555                 float tmp = normalize_v3(side2);
00556                 divs2 = (int)ceil(tmp/fsTri); 
00557             }
00558 
00559             (*tridivs)[3 * facecounter + 0] = divs1;
00560             (*tridivs)[3 * facecounter + 1] = divs2;
00561             (*tridivs)[3 * facecounter + 2] = divs3;
00562         }
00563         facecounter++;
00564     }
00565 }
00566 
00567 #endif /* WITH_SMOKE */
00568 
00569 static void smokeModifier_freeDomain(SmokeModifierData *smd)
00570 {
00571     if (smd->domain)
00572     {
00573         if (smd->domain->shadow)
00574                 MEM_freeN(smd->domain->shadow);
00575             smd->domain->shadow = NULL;
00576 
00577         if (smd->domain->fluid)
00578             smoke_free(smd->domain->fluid);
00579 
00580         if (smd->domain->wt)
00581             smoke_turbulence_free(smd->domain->wt);
00582 
00583         if (smd->domain->effector_weights)
00584                 MEM_freeN(smd->domain->effector_weights);
00585         smd->domain->effector_weights = NULL;
00586 
00587         BKE_ptcache_free_list(&(smd->domain->ptcaches[0]));
00588         smd->domain->point_cache[0] = NULL;
00589 
00590         MEM_freeN(smd->domain);
00591         smd->domain = NULL;
00592     }
00593 }
00594 
00595 static void smokeModifier_freeFlow(SmokeModifierData *smd)
00596 {
00597     if (smd->flow)
00598     {
00599 /*
00600         if (smd->flow->bvh)
00601         {
00602             free_bvhtree_from_mesh(smd->flow->bvh);
00603             MEM_freeN(smd->flow->bvh);
00604         }
00605         smd->flow->bvh = NULL;
00606 */
00607         MEM_freeN(smd->flow);
00608         smd->flow = NULL;
00609     }
00610 }
00611 
00612 static void smokeModifier_freeCollision(SmokeModifierData *smd)
00613 {
00614     if (smd->coll)
00615     {
00616         if (smd->coll->points)
00617         {
00618             MEM_freeN(smd->coll->points);
00619             smd->coll->points = NULL;
00620         }
00621 
00622         if (smd->coll->bvhtree)
00623         {
00624             BLI_bvhtree_free(smd->coll->bvhtree);
00625             smd->coll->bvhtree = NULL;
00626         }
00627 
00628 #ifdef USE_SMOKE_COLLISION_DM
00629         if (smd->coll->dm)
00630             smd->coll->dm->release(smd->coll->dm);
00631         smd->coll->dm = NULL;
00632 #endif
00633 
00634         MEM_freeN(smd->coll);
00635         smd->coll = NULL;
00636     }
00637 }
00638 
00639 void smokeModifier_reset_turbulence(struct SmokeModifierData *smd)
00640 {
00641     if (smd && smd->domain && smd->domain->wt)
00642     {
00643         smoke_turbulence_free(smd->domain->wt);
00644         smd->domain->wt = NULL;
00645     }
00646 }
00647 
00648 void smokeModifier_reset(struct SmokeModifierData *smd)
00649 {
00650     if (smd)
00651     {
00652         if (smd->domain)
00653         {
00654             if (smd->domain->shadow)
00655                 MEM_freeN(smd->domain->shadow);
00656             smd->domain->shadow = NULL;
00657 
00658             if (smd->domain->fluid)
00659             {
00660                 smoke_free(smd->domain->fluid);
00661                 smd->domain->fluid = NULL;
00662             }
00663 
00664             smokeModifier_reset_turbulence(smd);
00665 
00666             smd->time = -1;
00667 
00668             // printf("reset domain end\n");
00669         }
00670         else if (smd->flow)
00671         {
00672             /*
00673             if (smd->flow->bvh)
00674             {
00675                 free_bvhtree_from_mesh(smd->flow->bvh);
00676                 MEM_freeN(smd->flow->bvh);
00677             }
00678             smd->flow->bvh = NULL;
00679             */
00680         }
00681         else if (smd->coll)
00682         {
00683             if (smd->coll->points)
00684             {
00685                 MEM_freeN(smd->coll->points);
00686                 smd->coll->points = NULL;
00687             }
00688 
00689             if (smd->coll->bvhtree)
00690             {
00691                 BLI_bvhtree_free(smd->coll->bvhtree);
00692                 smd->coll->bvhtree = NULL;
00693             }
00694 
00695 #ifdef USE_SMOKE_COLLISION_DM
00696             if (smd->coll->dm)
00697                 smd->coll->dm->release(smd->coll->dm);
00698             smd->coll->dm = NULL;
00699 #endif
00700 
00701         }
00702     }
00703 }
00704 
00705 void smokeModifier_free (SmokeModifierData *smd)
00706 {
00707     if (smd)
00708     {
00709         smokeModifier_freeDomain(smd);
00710         smokeModifier_freeFlow(smd);
00711         smokeModifier_freeCollision(smd);
00712     }
00713 }
00714 
00715 void smokeModifier_createType(struct SmokeModifierData *smd)
00716 {
00717     if (smd)
00718     {
00719         if (smd->type & MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_DOMAIN)
00720         {
00721             if (smd->domain)
00722                 smokeModifier_freeDomain(smd);
00723 
00724             smd->domain = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SmokeDomainSettings), "SmokeDomain");
00725 
00726             smd->domain->smd = smd;
00727 
00728             smd->domain->point_cache[0] = BKE_ptcache_add(&(smd->domain->ptcaches[0]));
00729             smd->domain->point_cache[0]->flag |= PTCACHE_DISK_CACHE;
00730             smd->domain->point_cache[0]->step = 1;
00731 
00732             /* Deprecated */
00733             smd->domain->point_cache[1] = NULL;
00734             smd->domain->ptcaches[1].first = smd->domain->ptcaches[1].last = NULL;
00735             /* set some standard values */
00736             smd->domain->fluid = NULL;
00737             smd->domain->wt = NULL;         
00738             smd->domain->eff_group = NULL;
00739             smd->domain->fluid_group = NULL;
00740             smd->domain->coll_group = NULL;
00741             smd->domain->maxres = 32;
00742             smd->domain->amplify = 1;           
00743             smd->domain->omega = 1.0;           
00744             smd->domain->alpha = -0.001;
00745             smd->domain->beta = 0.1;
00746             smd->domain->time_scale = 1.0;
00747             smd->domain->vorticity = 2.0;
00748             smd->domain->border_collisions = 1;     // vertically non-colliding
00749             smd->domain->flags = MOD_SMOKE_DISSOLVE_LOG | MOD_SMOKE_HIGH_SMOOTH;
00750             smd->domain->strength = 2.0;
00751             smd->domain->noise = MOD_SMOKE_NOISEWAVE;
00752             smd->domain->diss_speed = 5;
00753             // init 3dview buffer
00754 
00755             smd->domain->viewsettings = MOD_SMOKE_VIEW_SHOWBIG;
00756             smd->domain->effector_weights = BKE_add_effector_weights(NULL);
00757         }
00758         else if (smd->type & MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_FLOW)
00759         {
00760             if (smd->flow)
00761                 smokeModifier_freeFlow(smd);
00762 
00763             smd->flow = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SmokeFlowSettings), "SmokeFlow");
00764 
00765             smd->flow->smd = smd;
00766 
00767             /* set some standard values */
00768             smd->flow->density = 1.0;
00769             smd->flow->temp = 1.0;
00770             smd->flow->flags = MOD_SMOKE_FLOW_ABSOLUTE;
00771             smd->flow->vel_multi = 1.0;
00772 
00773             smd->flow->psys = NULL;
00774 
00775         }
00776         else if (smd->type & MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_COLL)
00777         {
00778             if (smd->coll)
00779                 smokeModifier_freeCollision(smd);
00780 
00781             smd->coll = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SmokeCollSettings), "SmokeColl");
00782 
00783             smd->coll->smd = smd;
00784             smd->coll->points = NULL;
00785             smd->coll->numpoints = 0;
00786             smd->coll->bvhtree = NULL;
00787 
00788 #ifdef USE_SMOKE_COLLISION_DM
00789             smd->coll->dm = NULL;
00790 #endif
00791         }
00792     }
00793 }
00794 
00795 void smokeModifier_copy(struct SmokeModifierData *smd, struct SmokeModifierData *tsmd)
00796 {
00797     tsmd->type = smd->type;
00798     tsmd->time = smd->time;
00799     
00800     smokeModifier_createType(tsmd);
00801 
00802     if (tsmd->domain) {
00803         tsmd->domain->maxres = smd->domain->maxres;
00804         tsmd->domain->amplify = smd->domain->amplify;
00805         tsmd->domain->omega = smd->domain->omega;
00806         tsmd->domain->alpha = smd->domain->alpha;
00807         tsmd->domain->beta = smd->domain->beta;
00808         tsmd->domain->flags = smd->domain->flags;
00809         tsmd->domain->strength = smd->domain->strength;
00810         tsmd->domain->noise = smd->domain->noise;
00811         tsmd->domain->diss_speed = smd->domain->diss_speed;
00812         tsmd->domain->viewsettings = smd->domain->viewsettings;
00813         tsmd->domain->fluid_group = smd->domain->fluid_group;
00814         tsmd->domain->coll_group = smd->domain->coll_group;
00815         tsmd->domain->vorticity = smd->domain->vorticity;
00816         tsmd->domain->time_scale = smd->domain->time_scale;
00817         tsmd->domain->border_collisions = smd->domain->border_collisions;
00818         
00819         MEM_freeN(tsmd->domain->effector_weights);
00820         tsmd->domain->effector_weights = MEM_dupallocN(smd->domain->effector_weights);
00821     }
00822     else if (tsmd->flow) {
00823         tsmd->flow->density = smd->flow->density;
00824         tsmd->flow->temp = smd->flow->temp;
00825         tsmd->flow->psys = smd->flow->psys;
00826         tsmd->flow->type = smd->flow->type;
00827         tsmd->flow->flags = smd->flow->flags;
00828         tsmd->flow->vel_multi = smd->flow->vel_multi;
00829     }
00830     else if (tsmd->coll) {
00831         ;
00832         /* leave it as initialized, collision settings is mostly caches */
00833     }
00834 }

00836 #ifdef WITH_SMOKE

00838 // forward decleration
00839 static void smoke_calc_transparency(float *result, float *input, float *p0, float *p1, int res[3], float dx, float *light, bresenham_callback cb, float correct);
00840 static float calc_voxel_transp(float *result, float *input, int res[3], int *pixel, float *tRay, float correct);
00841 
00842 static int get_lamp(Scene *scene, float *light)
00843 {   
00844     Base *base_tmp = NULL;  
00845     int found_lamp = 0;
00846 
00847     // try to find a lamp, preferably local
00848     for (base_tmp = scene->base.first; base_tmp; base_tmp= base_tmp->next) {
00849         if (base_tmp->object->type == OB_LAMP) {
00850             Lamp *la = base_tmp->object->data;
00851 
00852             if (la->type == LA_LOCAL) {
00853                 copy_v3_v3(light, base_tmp->object->obmat[3]);
00854                 return 1;
00855             }
00856             else if (!found_lamp) {
00857                 copy_v3_v3(light, base_tmp->object->obmat[3]);
00858                 found_lamp = 1;
00859             }
00860         }
00861     }
00862 
00863     return found_lamp;
00864 }
00865 
00866 static void smoke_calc_domain(Scene *scene, Object *ob, SmokeModifierData *smd)
00867 {
00868     SmokeDomainSettings *sds = smd->domain;
00869     GroupObject *go = NULL;         
00870     Base *base = NULL;  
00871 
00872     // do collisions, needs to be done before emission, so that smoke isn't emitted inside collision cells
00873     if (1)
00874     {
00875         Object *otherobj = NULL;
00876         ModifierData *md = NULL;
00877 
00878         if (sds->coll_group) // we use groups since we have 2 domains
00879             go = sds->coll_group->gobject.first;
00880         else
00881             base = scene->base.first;
00882 
00883         while (base || go)
00884         {
00885             otherobj = NULL;
00886             if (sds->coll_group) 
00887             {                       
00888                 if (go->ob)                         
00889                     otherobj = go->ob;                  
00890             }                   
00891             else                        
00892                 otherobj = base->object;                    
00893             if (!otherobj)                  
00894             {                       
00895                 if (sds->coll_group)                            
00896                     go = go->next;                      
00897                 else                            
00898                     base= base->next;                       
00899                 continue;                   
00900             }           
00901             md = modifiers_findByType(otherobj, eModifierType_Smoke);
00902             
00903             // check for active smoke modifier
00904             if (md && md->mode & (eModifierMode_Realtime | eModifierMode_Render))                   
00905             {
00906                 SmokeModifierData *smd2 = (SmokeModifierData *)md;
00907 
00908                 if ((smd2->type & MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_COLL) && smd2->coll && smd2->coll->points)
00909                 {
00910                     // we got nice collision object
00911                     SmokeCollSettings *scs = smd2->coll;
00912                     size_t i, j;
00913                     unsigned char *obstacles = smoke_get_obstacle(smd->domain->fluid);
00914 
00915                     for (i = 0; i < scs->numpoints; i++)
00916                     {
00917                         int badcell = 0;
00918                         size_t index = 0;
00919                         int cell[3];
00920 
00921                         // 1. get corresponding cell
00922                         get_cell(smd->domain->p0, smd->domain->res, smd->domain->dx, &scs->points[3 * i], cell, 0);
00923                     
00924                         // check if cell is valid (in the domain boundary)
00925                         for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00926                             if ((cell[j] > sds->res[j] - 1) || (cell[j] < 0))
00927                             {
00928                                 badcell = 1;
00929                                 break;
00930                             }
00931                                                                 
00932                             if (badcell)                                    
00933                                 continue;
00934                         // 2. set cell values (heat, density and velocity)
00935                         index = smoke_get_index(cell[0], sds->res[0], cell[1], sds->res[1], cell[2]);
00936                                                         
00937                         // printf("cell[0]: %d, cell[1]: %d, cell[2]: %d\n", cell[0], cell[1], cell[2]);                                
00938                         // printf("res[0]: %d, res[1]: %d, res[2]: %d, index: %d\n\n", sds->res[0], sds->res[1], sds->res[2], index);                                                                   
00939                         obstacles[index] = 1;
00940                         // for moving gobstacles                                
00941                         /*
00942                         const LbmFloat maxVelVal = 0.1666;
00943                         const LbmFloat maxusqr = maxVelVal*maxVelVal*3. *1.5;
00944 
00945                         LbmVec objvel = vec2L((mMOIVertices[n]-mMOIVerticesOld[n]) /dvec); 
00946                         {                               
00947                         const LbmFloat usqr = (objvel[0]*objvel[0]+objvel[1]*objvel[1]+objvel[2]*objvel[2])*1.5;                                
00948                         USQRMAXCHECK(usqr, objvel[0],objvel[1],objvel[2], mMaxVlen, mMxvx,mMxvy,mMxvz);                                 
00949                         if (usqr>maxusqr) {                                     
00950                         // cutoff at maxVelVal                                  
00951                         for (int jj=0; jj<3; jj++) {                                        
00952                         if (objvel[jj] > 0.0) objvel[jj] =  maxVelVal;
00953                         if (objvel[jj] < 0.0) objvel[jj] = -maxVelVal;
00954                         }                               
00955                         } 
00956                         }                               
00957                         const LbmFloat dp=dot(objvel, vec2L((*pNormals)[n]) );                              
00958                         const LbmVec oldov=objvel; // debug                             
00959                         objvel = vec2L((*pNormals)[n]) *dp;                             
00960                         */
00961                     }
00962                 }
00963             }
00964 
00965             if (sds->coll_group)
00966                 go = go->next;
00967             else
00968                 base= base->next;
00969         }
00970     }
00971 
00972     // do flows and fluids
00973     if (1)          
00974     {
00975         Object *otherobj = NULL;                
00976         ModifierData *md = NULL;
00977         if (sds->fluid_group) // we use groups since we have 2 domains
00978             go = sds->fluid_group->gobject.first;               
00979         else                    
00980             base = scene->base.first;
00981         while (base || go)
00982         {                   
00983             otherobj = NULL;
00984             if (sds->fluid_group) 
00985             {
00986                 if (go->ob)                         
00987                     otherobj = go->ob;                  
00988             }                   
00989             else                        
00990                 otherobj = base->object;
00991             if (!otherobj)
00992             {
00993                 if (sds->fluid_group)
00994                     go = go->next;
00995                 else
00996                     base= base->next;
00997 
00998                 continue;
00999             }
01000 
01001             md = modifiers_findByType(otherobj, eModifierType_Smoke);
01002             
01003             // check for active smoke modifier
01004             if (md && md->mode & (eModifierMode_Realtime | eModifierMode_Render))
01005             {
01006                 SmokeModifierData *smd2 = (SmokeModifierData *)md;
01007                 
01008                 // check for initialized smoke object
01009                 if ((smd2->type & MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_FLOW) && smd2->flow)                       
01010                 {
01011                     // we got nice flow object
01012                     SmokeFlowSettings *sfs = smd2->flow;
01013                     
01014                     if (sfs && sfs->psys && sfs->psys->part && sfs->psys->part->type==PART_EMITTER) // is particle system selected
01015                     {
01016                         ParticleSimulationData sim;
01017                         ParticleSystem *psys = sfs->psys;
01018                         int totpart=psys->totpart, totchild;
01019                         int p = 0;                              
01020                         float *density = smoke_get_density(sds->fluid);                             
01021                         float *bigdensity = smoke_turbulence_get_density(sds->wt);                              
01022                         float *heat = smoke_get_heat(sds->fluid);                               
01023                         float *velocity_x = smoke_get_velocity_x(sds->fluid);                               
01024                         float *velocity_y = smoke_get_velocity_y(sds->fluid);                               
01025                         float *velocity_z = smoke_get_velocity_z(sds->fluid);                               
01026                         unsigned char *obstacle = smoke_get_obstacle(sds->fluid);                               
01027                         int bigres[3];
01028                         short absolute_flow = (sfs->flags & MOD_SMOKE_FLOW_ABSOLUTE);
01029                         short high_emission_smoothing = bigdensity ? (smd->domain->flags & MOD_SMOKE_HIGH_SMOOTH) : 0;
01030 
01031                         /*
01032                         * A temporary volume map used to store whole emissive
01033                         * area to be added to smoke density and interpolated
01034                         * for high resolution smoke.
01035                         */
01036                         float *temp_emission_map = NULL;
01037 
01038                         sim.scene = scene;
01039                         sim.ob = otherobj;
01040                         sim.psys = psys;
01041 
01042                         // initialize temp emission map
01043                         if (!(sfs->type & MOD_SMOKE_FLOW_TYPE_OUTFLOW))
01044                         {
01045                             int i;
01046                             temp_emission_map = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * sds->res[0]*sds->res[1]*sds->res[2], "SmokeTempEmission");
01047                             // set whole volume to 0.0f
01048                             for (i=0; i<sds->res[0]*sds->res[1]*sds->res[2]; i++) {
01049                                 temp_emission_map[i] = 0.0f;
01050                             }
01051                         }
01052                                                         
01053                         // mostly copied from particle code                             
01054                         if (psys->part->type==PART_HAIR)
01055                         {
01056                             /*
01057                             if (psys->childcache)
01058                             {
01059                                 totchild = psys->totchildcache;
01060                             }
01061                             else
01062                             */
01063 
01064                             // TODO: PART_HAIR not supported whatsoever
01065                             totchild=0;
01066                         }
01067                         else
01068                             totchild=psys->totchild*psys->part->disp/100;
01069                         
01070                         for (p=0; p<totpart+totchild; p++)                              
01071                         {
01072                             int cell[3];
01073                             size_t i = 0;
01074                             size_t index = 0;
01075                             int badcell = 0;
01076                             ParticleKey state;
01077 
01078                             if (p < totpart)
01079                             {
01080                                 if (psys->particles[p].flag & (PARS_NO_DISP|PARS_UNEXIST))
01081                                     continue;
01082                             }
01083                             else {
01084                                 /* handle child particle */
01085                                 ChildParticle *cpa = &psys->child[p - totpart];
01086                     
01087                                 if (psys->particles[cpa->parent].flag & (PARS_NO_DISP|PARS_UNEXIST))
01088                                     continue;
01089                             }
01090 
01091                             state.time = smd->time;
01092                             if (psys_get_particle_state(&sim, p, &state, 0) == 0)
01093                                 continue;
01094                                                 
01095                             // copy_v3_v3(pos, pa->state.co);
01096                             // mul_m4_v3(ob->imat, pos);
01097                             // 1. get corresponding cell
01098                             get_cell(smd->domain->p0, smd->domain->res, smd->domain->dx, state.co, cell, 0);                                                                    
01099                             // check if cell is valid (in the domain boundary)                                  
01100                             for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)                                 
01101                             {                                       
01102                                 if ((cell[i] > sds->res[i] - 1) || (cell[i] < 0))                                       
01103                                 {                                           
01104                                     badcell = 1;                                            
01105                                     break;                                      
01106                                 }                                   
01107                             }                                                                           
01108                             if (badcell)                                        
01109                                 continue;                                                                       
01110                             // 2. set cell values (heat, density and velocity)                                  
01111                             index = smoke_get_index(cell[0], sds->res[0], cell[1], sds->res[1], cell[2]);                                                                       
01112                             if (!(sfs->type & MOD_SMOKE_FLOW_TYPE_OUTFLOW) && !(obstacle[index])) // this is inflow
01113                             {                                       
01114                                 // heat[index] += sfs->temp * 0.1;                                      
01115                                 // density[index] += sfs->density * 0.1;
01116                                 heat[index] = sfs->temp;
01117                                 
01118                                 // Add emitter density to temp emission map
01119                                 temp_emission_map[index] = sfs->density;
01120 
01121                                 // Uses particle velocity as initial velocity for smoke
01122                                 if (sfs->flags & MOD_SMOKE_FLOW_INITVELOCITY && (psys->part->phystype != PART_PHYS_NO))
01123                                 {
01124                                     velocity_x[index] = state.vel[0]*sfs->vel_multi;
01125                                     velocity_y[index] = state.vel[1]*sfs->vel_multi;
01126                                     velocity_z[index] = state.vel[2]*sfs->vel_multi;
01127                                 }                                       
01128                             }                                   
01129                             else if (sfs->type & MOD_SMOKE_FLOW_TYPE_OUTFLOW) // outflow                                    
01130                             {                                       
01131                                 heat[index] = 0.f;                                      
01132                                 density[index] = 0.f;                                       
01133                                 velocity_x[index] = 0.f;                                        
01134                                 velocity_y[index] = 0.f;                                        
01135                                 velocity_z[index] = 0.f;
01136                                 // we need different handling for the high-res feature
01137                                 if (bigdensity)
01138                                 {
01139                                     // init all surrounding cells according to amplification, too                                           
01140                                     int i, j, k;
01141                                     smoke_turbulence_get_res(smd->domain->wt, bigres);
01142 
01143                                     for (i = 0; i < smd->domain->amplify + 1; i++)
01144                                         for (j = 0; j < smd->domain->amplify + 1; j++)
01145                                             for (k = 0; k < smd->domain->amplify + 1; k++)
01146                                             {                                                       
01147                                                 index = smoke_get_index((smd->domain->amplify + 1)* cell[0] + i, bigres[0], (smd->domain->amplify + 1)* cell[1] + j, bigres[1], (smd->domain->amplify + 1)* cell[2] + k);                                                       
01148                                                 bigdensity[index] = 0.f;                                                    
01149                                             }                                       
01150                                 }
01151                             }
01152                             }   // particles loop
01153 
01154 
01155                             // apply emission values
01156                             if (!(sfs->type & MOD_SMOKE_FLOW_TYPE_OUTFLOW)) {
01157 
01158                                 // initialize variables
01159                                 int ii, jj, kk, x, y, z, block_size;
01160                                 size_t index, index_big;
01161 
01162                                 smoke_turbulence_get_res(smd->domain->wt, bigres);
01163                                 block_size = smd->domain->amplify + 1;  // high res block size
01164 
01165 
01166                                     // loop through every low res cell
01167                                     for (x = 0; x < sds->res[0]; x++)
01168                                         for (y = 0; y < sds->res[1]; y++)
01169                                             for (z = 0; z < sds->res[2]; z++)                                                   
01170                                             {
01171 
01172                                                 // neighbor cell emission densities (for high resolution smoke smooth interpolation)
01173                                                 float c000, c001, c010, c011,  c100, c101, c110, c111;
01174 
01175                                                 c000 = (x>0 && y>0 && z>0) ? temp_emission_map[smoke_get_index(x-1, sds->res[0], y-1, sds->res[1], z-1)] : 0;
01176                                                 c001 = (x>0 && y>0) ? temp_emission_map[smoke_get_index(x-1, sds->res[0], y-1, sds->res[1], z)] : 0;
01177                                                 c010 = (x>0 && z>0) ? temp_emission_map[smoke_get_index(x-1, sds->res[0], y, sds->res[1], z-1)] : 0;
01178                                                 c011 = (x>0) ? temp_emission_map[smoke_get_index(x-1, sds->res[0], y, sds->res[1], z)] : 0;
01179 
01180                                                 c100 = (y>0 && z>0) ? temp_emission_map[smoke_get_index(x, sds->res[0], y-1, sds->res[1], z-1)] : 0;
01181                                                 c101 = (y>0) ? temp_emission_map[smoke_get_index(x, sds->res[0], y-1, sds->res[1], z)] : 0;
01182                                                 c110 = (z>0) ? temp_emission_map[smoke_get_index(x, sds->res[0], y, sds->res[1], z-1)] : 0;
01183                                                 c111 = temp_emission_map[smoke_get_index(x, sds->res[0], y, sds->res[1], z)];           // this cell
01184 
01185 
01186 
01187                                                 // get cell index
01188                                                 index = smoke_get_index(x, sds->res[0], y, sds->res[1], z);
01189 
01190                                                 // add emission to low resolution density
01191                                                 if (absolute_flow) {if (temp_emission_map[index]>0) density[index] = temp_emission_map[index];}
01192                                                 else {
01193                                                     density[index] += temp_emission_map[index];
01194                                                     if (density[index]>1) density[index]=1.0f;
01195                                                 }
01196 
01197                                                 smoke_turbulence_get_res(smd->domain->wt, bigres);
01198 
01199 
01200 
01201                                                 /*
01202                                                 loop through high res blocks if high res enabled
01203                                                 */
01204                                                 if (bigdensity)
01205                                                 for (ii = 0; ii < block_size; ii++)
01206                                                     for (jj = 0; jj < block_size; jj++)
01207                                                         for (kk = 0; kk < block_size; kk++)                                                 
01208                                                         {
01209 
01210                                                         float fx,fy,fz, interpolated_value;
01211                                                         int shift_x, shift_y, shift_z;
01212 
01213 
01214                                                         /*
01215                                                         * Do volume interpolation if emitter smoothing
01216                                                         * is enabled
01217                                                         */
01218                                                         if (high_emission_smoothing) {
01219                                                             // convert block position to relative
01220                                                             // for interpolation smoothing
01221                                                             fx = (float)ii/block_size + 0.5f/block_size;
01222                                                             fy = (float)jj/block_size + 0.5f/block_size;
01223                                                             fz = (float)kk/block_size + 0.5f/block_size;
01224 
01225                                                             // calculate trilinear interpolation
01226                                                             interpolated_value = c000 * (1-fx) * (1-fy) * (1-fz) +
01227                                                             c100 * fx * (1-fy) * (1-fz) +
01228                                                             c010 * (1-fx) * fy * (1-fz) +
01229                                                             c001 * (1-fx) * (1-fy) * fz +
01230                                                             c101 * fx * (1-fy) * fz +
01231                                                             c011 * (1-fx) * fy * fz +
01232                                                             c110 * fx * fy * (1-fz) +
01233                                                             c111 * fx * fy * fz;
01234 
01235 
01236                                                             // add some contrast / sharpness
01237                                                             // depending on hi-res block size
01238 
01239                                                             interpolated_value = (interpolated_value-0.4f*sfs->density)*(block_size/2) + 0.4f*sfs->density;
01240                                                             if (interpolated_value<0.0f) interpolated_value = 0.0f;
01241                                                             if (interpolated_value>1.0f) interpolated_value = 1.0f;
01242 
01243                                                             // shift smoke block index
01244                                                             // (because pixel center is actually
01245                                                             // in halfway of the low res block)
01246                                                             shift_x = (x < 1) ? 0 : block_size/2;
01247                                                             shift_y = (y < 1) ? 0 : block_size/2;
01248                                                             shift_z = (z < 1) ? 0 : block_size/2;
01249                                                         }
01250                                                         else {
01251                                                             // without interpolation use same low resolution
01252                                                             // block value for all hi-res blocks
01253                                                             interpolated_value = c111;
01254                                                             shift_x = 0;
01255                                                             shift_y = 0;
01256                                                             shift_z = 0;
01257                                                         }
01258 
01259                                                         // get shifted index for current high resolution block
01260                                                         index_big = smoke_get_index(block_size * x + ii - shift_x, bigres[0], block_size * y + jj - shift_y, bigres[1], block_size * z + kk - shift_z);                                                     
01261                                                         
01262                                                         // add emission data to high resolution density
01263                                                         if (absolute_flow) {if (interpolated_value > 0) bigdensity[index_big] = interpolated_value;}
01264                                                         else {
01265                                                             bigdensity[index_big] += interpolated_value;
01266                                                             if (bigdensity[index_big]>1) bigdensity[index_big]=1.0f;
01267                                                         }
01268 
01269                                                         } // end of hires loop
01270 
01271                                     }   // end of low res loop
01272 
01273                                 // free temporary emission map
01274                             if (temp_emission_map) MEM_freeN(temp_emission_map);
01275 
01276                             }   // end emission
01277 
01278 
01279                                         
01280                 }                           
01281                 else {                              
01282                     /*                              
01283                     for ()                              
01284                     {                                   
01285                         // no psys                                  
01286                         BVHTreeNearest nearest;
01287                         nearest.index = -1;
01288                         nearest.dist = FLT_MAX;
01289 
01290                         BLI_bvhtree_find_nearest(sfs->bvh->tree, pco, &nearest, sfs->bvh->nearest_callback, sfs->bvh);
01291                     }*/                         
01292                 }
01293             }                       
01294         }
01295             if (sds->fluid_group)
01296                 go = go->next;
01297             else
01298                 base= base->next;
01299         }
01300     }
01301 
01302     // do effectors
01303     {
01304         ListBase *effectors = pdInitEffectors(scene, ob, NULL, sds->effector_weights);
01305 
01306         if (effectors)
01307         {
01308             float *density = smoke_get_density(sds->fluid);
01309             float *force_x = smoke_get_force_x(sds->fluid);
01310             float *force_y = smoke_get_force_y(sds->fluid);
01311             float *force_z = smoke_get_force_z(sds->fluid);
01312             float *velocity_x = smoke_get_velocity_x(sds->fluid);
01313             float *velocity_y = smoke_get_velocity_y(sds->fluid);
01314             float *velocity_z = smoke_get_velocity_z(sds->fluid);
01315             int x, y, z;
01316 
01317             // precalculate wind forces
01318             for (x = 0; x < sds->res[0]; x++)
01319                 for (y = 0; y < sds->res[1]; y++)
01320                     for (z = 0; z < sds->res[2]; z++)
01321             {   
01322                 EffectedPoint epoint;
01323                 float voxelCenter[3] = {0,0,0} , vel[3] = {0,0,0} , retvel[3] = {0,0,0};
01324                 unsigned int index = smoke_get_index(x, sds->res[0], y, sds->res[1], z);
01325 
01326                 if (density[index] < FLT_EPSILON)                   
01327                     continue;   
01328 
01329                 vel[0] = velocity_x[index];
01330                 vel[1] = velocity_y[index];
01331                 vel[2] = velocity_z[index];
01332 
01333                 voxelCenter[0] = sds->p0[0] + sds->dx *  x + sds->dx * 0.5;
01334                 voxelCenter[1] = sds->p0[1] + sds->dx *  y + sds->dx * 0.5;
01335                 voxelCenter[2] = sds->p0[2] + sds->dx *  z + sds->dx * 0.5;
01336 
01337                 pd_point_from_loc(scene, voxelCenter, vel, index, &epoint);
01338                 pdDoEffectors(effectors, NULL, sds->effector_weights, &epoint, retvel, NULL);
01339 
01340                 // TODO dg - do in force!
01341                 force_x[index] = MIN2(MAX2(-1.0, retvel[0] * 0.2), 1.0); 
01342                 force_y[index] = MIN2(MAX2(-1.0, retvel[1] * 0.2), 1.0); 
01343                 force_z[index] = MIN2(MAX2(-1.0, retvel[2] * 0.2), 1.0);
01344             }
01345         }
01346 
01347         pdEndEffectors(&effectors);
01348     }
01349 
01350 }
01351 void smokeModifier_do(SmokeModifierData *smd, Scene *scene, Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm)
01352 {   
01353     if ((smd->type & MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_FLOW))
01354     {
01355         if (scene->r.cfra >= smd->time)
01356             smokeModifier_init(smd, ob, scene, dm);
01357 
01358         if (scene->r.cfra > smd->time)
01359         {
01360             // XXX TODO
01361             smd->time = scene->r.cfra;
01362 
01363             // rigid movement support
01364             /*
01365             copy_m4_m4(smd->flow->mat_old, smd->flow->mat);
01366             copy_m4_m4(smd->flow->mat, ob->obmat);
01367             */
01368         }
01369         else if (scene->r.cfra < smd->time)
01370         {
01371             smd->time = scene->r.cfra;
01372             smokeModifier_reset(smd);
01373         }
01374     }
01375     else if (smd->type & MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_COLL)
01376     {
01377         if (scene->r.cfra >= smd->time)
01378             smokeModifier_init(smd, ob, scene, dm);
01379 
01380         if (scene->r.cfra > smd->time)
01381         {
01382             // XXX TODO
01383             smd->time = scene->r.cfra;
01384 
01385 #ifdef USE_SMOKE_COLLISION_DM
01386             if (smd->coll->dm)
01387                 smd->coll->dm->release(smd->coll->dm);
01388 
01389             smd->coll->dm = CDDM_copy_from_tessface(dm);
01390 #endif
01391 
01392             // rigid movement support
01393             copy_m4_m4(smd->coll->mat_old, smd->coll->mat);
01394             copy_m4_m4(smd->coll->mat, ob->obmat);
01395         }
01396         else if (scene->r.cfra < smd->time)
01397         {
01398             smd->time = scene->r.cfra;
01399             smokeModifier_reset(smd);
01400         }
01401     }
01402     else if (smd->type & MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_DOMAIN)
01403     {
01404         SmokeDomainSettings *sds = smd->domain;
01405         float light[3]; 
01406         PointCache *cache = NULL;
01407         PTCacheID pid;
01408         int startframe, endframe, framenr;
01409         float timescale;
01410 
01411         framenr = scene->r.cfra;
01412 
01413         //printf("time: %d\n", scene->r.cfra);
01414 
01415         cache = sds->point_cache[0];
01416         BKE_ptcache_id_from_smoke(&pid, ob, smd);
01417         BKE_ptcache_id_time(&pid, scene, framenr, &startframe, &endframe, &timescale);
01418 
01419         if (!smd->domain->fluid || framenr == startframe)
01420         {
01421             BKE_ptcache_id_reset(scene, &pid, PTCACHE_RESET_OUTDATED);
01422             BKE_ptcache_validate(cache, framenr);
01423             cache->flag &= ~PTCACHE_REDO_NEEDED;
01424         }
01425 
01426         if (!smd->domain->fluid && (framenr != startframe) && (smd->domain->flags & MOD_SMOKE_FILE_LOAD)==0 && (cache->flag & PTCACHE_BAKED)==0)
01427             return;
01428 
01429         smd->domain->flags &= ~MOD_SMOKE_FILE_LOAD;
01430 
01431         CLAMP(framenr, startframe, endframe);
01432 
01433         /* If already viewing a pre/after frame, no need to reload */
01434         if ((smd->time == framenr) && (framenr != scene->r.cfra))
01435             return;
01436 
01437         // printf("startframe: %d, framenr: %d\n", startframe, framenr);
01438 
01439         if (smokeModifier_init(smd, ob, scene, dm)==0)
01440         {
01441             printf("bad smokeModifier_init\n");
01442             return;
01443         }
01444 
01445         /* try to read from cache */
01446         if (BKE_ptcache_read(&pid, (float)framenr) == PTCACHE_READ_EXACT) {
01447             BKE_ptcache_validate(cache, framenr);
01448             smd->time = framenr;
01449             return;
01450         }
01451         
01452         /* only calculate something when we advanced a single frame */
01453         if (framenr != (int)smd->time+1)
01454             return;
01455 
01456         /* don't simulate if viewing start frame, but scene frame is not real start frame */
01457         if (framenr != scene->r.cfra)
01458             return;
01459 
01460         tstart();
01461 
01462         smoke_calc_domain(scene, ob, smd);
01463 
01464         /* if on second frame, write cache for first frame */
01465         if ((int)smd->time == startframe && (cache->flag & PTCACHE_OUTDATED || cache->last_exact==0)) {
01466             // create shadows straight after domain initialization so we get nice shadows for startframe, too
01467             if (get_lamp(scene, light))
01468                 smoke_calc_transparency(sds->shadow, smoke_get_density(sds->fluid), sds->p0, sds->p1, sds->res, sds->dx, light, calc_voxel_transp, -7.0*sds->dx);
01469 
01470             if (sds->wt)
01471             {
01472                 if (sds->flags & MOD_SMOKE_DISSOLVE)
01473                     smoke_dissolve_wavelet(sds->wt, sds->diss_speed, sds->flags & MOD_SMOKE_DISSOLVE_LOG);
01474                 smoke_turbulence_step(sds->wt, sds->fluid);
01475             }
01476 
01477             BKE_ptcache_write(&pid, startframe);
01478         }
01479         
01480         // set new time
01481         smd->time = scene->r.cfra;
01482 
01483         /* do simulation */
01484 
01485         // low res
01486 
01487         // simulate the actual smoke (c++ code in intern/smoke)
01488         // DG: interesting commenting this line + deactivating loading of noise files
01489         if (framenr!=startframe)
01490         {
01491             if (sds->flags & MOD_SMOKE_DISSOLVE)
01492                 smoke_dissolve(sds->fluid, sds->diss_speed, sds->flags & MOD_SMOKE_DISSOLVE_LOG);
01493             smoke_step(sds->fluid, smd->time, scene->r.frs_sec / scene->r.frs_sec_base);
01494         }
01495 
01496         // create shadows before writing cache so they get stored
01497         if (get_lamp(scene, light))
01498             smoke_calc_transparency(sds->shadow, smoke_get_density(sds->fluid), sds->p0, sds->p1, sds->res, sds->dx, light, calc_voxel_transp, -7.0*sds->dx);
01499 
01500         if (sds->wt)
01501         {
01502             if (sds->flags & MOD_SMOKE_DISSOLVE)
01503                 smoke_dissolve_wavelet(sds->wt, sds->diss_speed, sds->flags & MOD_SMOKE_DISSOLVE_LOG);
01504             smoke_turbulence_step(sds->wt, sds->fluid);
01505         }
01506     
01507         BKE_ptcache_validate(cache, framenr);
01508         if (framenr != startframe)
01509             BKE_ptcache_write(&pid, framenr);
01510 
01511         tend();
01512         //printf ( "Frame: %d, Time: %f\n", (int)smd->time, ( float ) tval() );
01513     }
01514 }
01515 
01516 static float calc_voxel_transp(float *result, float *input, int res[3], int *pixel, float *tRay, float correct)
01517 {
01518     const size_t index = smoke_get_index(pixel[0], res[0], pixel[1], res[1], pixel[2]);
01519 
01520     // T_ray *= T_vox
01521     *tRay *= exp(input[index]*correct);
01522     
01523     if (result[index] < 0.0f)   
01524     {
01525 #pragma omp critical        
01526         result[index] = *tRay;  
01527     }   
01528 
01529     return *tRay;
01530 }
01531 
01532 long long smoke_get_mem_req(int xres, int yres, int zres, int amplify)
01533 {
01534     int totalCells = xres * yres * zres;
01535     int amplifiedCells = totalCells * amplify * amplify * amplify;
01536 
01537     // print out memory requirements
01538     long long int coarseSize = sizeof(float) * totalCells * 22 +
01539     sizeof(unsigned char) * totalCells;
01540 
01541     long long int fineSize = sizeof(float) * amplifiedCells * 7 + // big grids
01542     sizeof(float) * totalCells * 8 +     // small grids
01543     sizeof(float) * 128 * 128 * 128;     // noise tile
01544 
01545     long long int totalMB = (coarseSize + fineSize) / (1024 * 1024);
01546 
01547     return totalMB;
01548 }
01549 
01550 static void bresenham_linie_3D(int x1, int y1, int z1, int x2, int y2, int z2, float *tRay, bresenham_callback cb, float *result, float *input, int res[3], float correct)
01551 {
01552     int dx, dy, dz, i, l, m, n, x_inc, y_inc, z_inc, err_1, err_2, dx2, dy2, dz2;
01553     int pixel[3];
01554 
01555     pixel[0] = x1;
01556     pixel[1] = y1;
01557     pixel[2] = z1;
01558 
01559     dx = x2 - x1;
01560     dy = y2 - y1;
01561     dz = z2 - z1;
01562 
01563     x_inc = (dx < 0) ? -1 : 1;
01564     l = abs(dx);
01565     y_inc = (dy < 0) ? -1 : 1;
01566     m = abs(dy);
01567     z_inc = (dz < 0) ? -1 : 1;
01568     n = abs(dz);
01569     dx2 = l << 1;
01570     dy2 = m << 1;
01571     dz2 = n << 1;
01572 
01573     if ((l >= m) && (l >= n)) {
01574         err_1 = dy2 - l;
01575         err_2 = dz2 - l;
01576         for (i = 0; i < l; i++) {
01577             if (cb(result, input, res, pixel, tRay, correct) <= FLT_EPSILON)
01578                 break;
01579             if (err_1 > 0) {
01580                 pixel[1] += y_inc;
01581                 err_1 -= dx2;
01582             }
01583             if (err_2 > 0) {
01584                 pixel[2] += z_inc;
01585                 err_2 -= dx2;
01586             }
01587             err_1 += dy2;
01588             err_2 += dz2;
01589             pixel[0] += x_inc;
01590         }
01591     }
01592     else if ((m >= l) && (m >= n)) {
01593         err_1 = dx2 - m;
01594         err_2 = dz2 - m;
01595         for (i = 0; i < m; i++) {
01596             if (cb(result, input, res, pixel, tRay, correct) <= FLT_EPSILON)
01597                 break;
01598             if (err_1 > 0) {
01599                 pixel[0] += x_inc;
01600                 err_1 -= dy2;
01601             }
01602             if (err_2 > 0) {
01603                 pixel[2] += z_inc;
01604                 err_2 -= dy2;
01605             }
01606             err_1 += dx2;
01607             err_2 += dz2;
01608             pixel[1] += y_inc;
01609         }
01610     }
01611     else {
01612         err_1 = dy2 - n;
01613         err_2 = dx2 - n;
01614         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01615             if (cb(result, input, res, pixel, tRay, correct) <= FLT_EPSILON)
01616                 break;
01617             if (err_1 > 0) {
01618                 pixel[1] += y_inc;
01619                 err_1 -= dz2;
01620             }
01621             if (err_2 > 0) {
01622                 pixel[0] += x_inc;
01623                 err_2 -= dz2;
01624             }
01625             err_1 += dy2;
01626             err_2 += dx2;
01627             pixel[2] += z_inc;
01628         }
01629     }
01630     cb(result, input, res, pixel, tRay, correct);
01631 }
01632 
01633 static void get_cell(float *p0, int res[3], float dx, float *pos, int *cell, int correct)
01634 {
01635     float tmp[3];
01636 
01637     sub_v3_v3v3(tmp, pos, p0);
01638     mul_v3_fl(tmp, 1.0 / dx);
01639 
01640     if (correct) {
01641         cell[0] = MIN2(res[0] - 1, MAX2(0, (int)floor(tmp[0])));
01642         cell[1] = MIN2(res[1] - 1, MAX2(0, (int)floor(tmp[1])));
01643         cell[2] = MIN2(res[2] - 1, MAX2(0, (int)floor(tmp[2])));
01644     }
01645     else {
01646         cell[0] = (int)floor(tmp[0]);
01647         cell[1] = (int)floor(tmp[1]);
01648         cell[2] = (int)floor(tmp[2]);
01649     }
01650 }
01651 
01652 static void smoke_calc_transparency(float *result, float *input, float *p0, float *p1, int res[3], float dx, float *light, bresenham_callback cb, float correct)
01653 {
01654     float bv[6];
01655     int a, z, slabsize=res[0]*res[1], size= res[0]*res[1]*res[2];
01656 
01657     for (a=0; a<size; a++)
01658         result[a]= -1.0f;
01659 
01660     bv[0] = p0[0];
01661     bv[1] = p1[0];
01662     // y
01663     bv[2] = p0[1];
01664     bv[3] = p1[1];
01665     // z
01666     bv[4] = p0[2];
01667     bv[5] = p1[2];
01668 
01669 #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static,1)
01670     for (z = 0; z < res[2]; z++)
01671     {
01672         size_t index = z*slabsize;
01673         int x,y;
01674 
01675         for (y = 0; y < res[1]; y++)
01676             for (x = 0; x < res[0]; x++, index++)
01677             {
01678                 float voxelCenter[3];
01679                 float pos[3];
01680                 int cell[3];
01681                 float tRay = 1.0;
01682 
01683                 if (result[index] >= 0.0f)                  
01684                     continue;                               
01685                 voxelCenter[0] = p0[0] + dx *  x + dx * 0.5;
01686                 voxelCenter[1] = p0[1] + dx *  y + dx * 0.5;
01687                 voxelCenter[2] = p0[2] + dx *  z + dx * 0.5;
01688 
01689                 // get starting position (in voxel coords)
01690                 if (BLI_bvhtree_bb_raycast(bv, light, voxelCenter, pos) > FLT_EPSILON)
01691                 {
01692                     // we're ouside
01693                     get_cell(p0, res, dx, pos, cell, 1);
01694                 }
01695                 else {
01696                     // we're inside
01697                     get_cell(p0, res, dx, light, cell, 1);
01698                 }
01699 
01700                 bresenham_linie_3D(cell[0], cell[1], cell[2], x, y, z, &tRay, cb, result, input, res, correct);
01701 
01702                 // convention -> from a RGBA float array, use G value for tRay
01703 // #pragma omp critical
01704                 result[index] = tRay;           
01705             }
01706     }
01707 }
01708 
01709 #endif /* WITH_SMOKE */
